author: J14T14
title: If You Like It, You Should Put A "Keychain" On It
review:
According to bricklink.com at the time of me writing this, this style of Brick Separator has come out in 450 sets and 5 gear items. It is common in sets that are $50 or more and it is extremely useful. Even with knowing all of this, i was surprised when I saw the pictures of this set. It seemed like an odd, but a pleasant choice.

It seems like the LEGO® Group just took a regular Brick Separator and punched a hole in it and stuck a key chain on. This is perfectly fine and I am ok with it. Now if anyone goes to a LEGO convention and needs to take something apart real quick, they they can just pull out their keys and use this.

Overall, this is a fun little keychain, but it may not be for everyone. It is a cool little thing to carry around, but you won't use it to often if you don't participate in regular LEGO conventions of places like that.
